'''Roiling Rime''' is [[Eula]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*The damage dealt by the Shattered Lightfall Sword is considered [[Elemental Burst]] DMG.
**As a result, it will grant an energy stack when charging the Lightfall Sword of [[Glacial Illumination]].

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{Talent Note|constellation|6|Noble Obligation}}
